/* SA012002.selectListSA012002 */ SELECT DISTINCT T.* FROM ( SELECT A.SALEID , B.SALEDATE , B.SALEGUBUN , fn_codename('01', '007', B.SALEGUBUN) AS SALEGUBUNNAME , B.SALERCD , B.CONNAME , B.CONM2 , B.CONPY , B.REMARK , C.SALEAMT , C.SALEDANGA , C.DCRATE , C.SELLAMT , C.AGENCYAMT , D.ADDRESS , E.KNAME , E.BRANCHCODE , fn_codename('02', E.BRANCHCODE, NULL) AS BRANCHNAME , (SELECT KNAME FROM hr_insamst WHERE DEPTCODE = E.DEPTCODE AND GRADE = '007' AND DUTY = '002' LIMIT 1) AS MNGRNAME , (SELECT DEPOSITDATE FROM sa_ipgumscheduletb WHERE SALEID = A.SALEID ORDER BY DEPOSITDATE DESC LIMIT 1) AS DEPOSITDATE , (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(DEPOSITAMT), 0) FROM sa_ipgumscheduletb WHERE SALEID = B.SALEID AND DEPOSITGUBUN = '002') AS DEPOSITAMT1 , (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(DEPOSITAMT), 0) FROM sa_ipgumscheduletb WHERE SALEID = B.SALEID AND DEPOSITGUBUN = '003') AS DEPOSITAMT2 , (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(DEPOSITAMT), 0) FROM sa_ipgumscheduletb WHERE SALEID = B.SALEID AND DEPOSITGUBUN = '004') AS DEPOSITAMT3 , (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(SUGUMAMT), 0) FROM sa_ipgumdtl WHERE SALEID = B.SALEID AND PAYGUBUN = '002') AS SUGUMAMT1 , (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(SUGUMAMT), 0) FROM sa_ipgumdtl WHERE SALEID = B.SALEID AND PAYGUBUN = '003') AS SUGUMAMT2 , (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(SUGUMAMT), 0) FROM sa_ipgumdtl WHERE SALEID = B.SALEID AND PAYGUBUN = '004') AS SUGUMAMT3 , (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(SUGUMAMT), 0) FROM sa_ipgumdtl WHERE SALEID = B.SALEID AND PAYGUBUN IN ('002', '003')) AS SUGUMAMT , (IFNULL(C.SELLAMT, 0) - (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(SUGUMAMT), 0) FROM sa_ipgumdtl WHERE SALEID = B.SALEID AND PAYGUBUN IN ('002', '003'))) AS REMNAMT , (((SELECT IFNULL(SUM(SUGUMAMT), 0) FROM sa_ipgumdtl WHERE SALEID = B.SALEID AND PAYGUBUN IN ('002', '003')) / IFNULL(C.SELLAMT, 0)) * 100) AS IPGUMRATE FROM ( SELECT * FROM sa_ipgumscheduletb WHERE DEPOSITGUBUN = '004' AND DEPOSITYN = 'N') A INNER JOIN sa_salemst B ON A.SALEID = B.SALEID INNER JOIN sa_saledtl C ON B.SALEID = C.SALEID INNER JOIN mm_buymst D ON B.BUYID = D.BUYID LEFT OUTER JOIN hr_insamst E ON B.SALERCD = E.INSACODE WHERE A.SALEID NOT IN (SELECT SALEID FROM sa_salehistorytb WHERE CHGGUBUN = '004')
AND B.SALEDATE BETWEEN #S_SALEDATE_FR# AND #S_SALEDATE_TO#
AND E.BRANCHCODE = #S_BRANCHCODE#
AND E.DEPTCODE = #S_DEPTCODE#
AND E.KNAME LIKE '%$S_KNAME$%'
ORDER BY E.BRANCHCODE ASC, E.DEPTCODE ASC, B.SALEDATE ASC ) T
